alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Knox; Peoria (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 7:00AM CDT until August 11 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Fulton County in west central Illinois... Southern Knox County in west central Illinois... Southwestern Peoria County in central Illinois... * Until 745 AM CDT. * At 659 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gilson, or 11 miles southeast of Galesburg, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Maquon around 705 AM CDT. Fairview around 715 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Elmwood, Yates City, Farmington, Trivoli, Canton and Hanna City. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 54 and 67. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
